Monologue.Current: Сид{Line}“Итак... Проблемная команда{Line} в полном составе...{Line} Впрочем, с таким молодым инструктором...{Line} Могло быть и хуже.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Staff{Line}“So... The problem team, Squad B.{Line} ...Guess it can’t be helped{Line} with a rookie instructor.”

Monologue.Current: Сид{Line}“Куда это ты собрался?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Staff{Line}“Where do you think you’re going?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“На корбаль, бегом!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“To the vessel, now!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Вы свободны.”{Next}“Накупите сувениров... осмотритесь.{Line} В общем, развлекайтесь.{Line} Но рекомендую хорошенько отдохнуть.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Ok, you’re free to go.”{Next}“You can buy some souvenirs...{Line} Have a review meeting... It’s up to you.{Line} I recommend you go back and rest, though.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Nice work.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Nice work.”

Monologue.Current: “СЕЙФЕР!”
Monologue.Original: “SEIFER!”

Monologue.Current: Райдзин{Line}“Как оно?”
Monologue.Original: Raijin{Line}“How’d it go?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Не спрашивай, мужик...{Line} Все только и делали, что путались{Line} под нагами. Не просто быть лидером.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Man... All they did was get in my way.{Line} Being a leader ain’t easy.”

Monologue.Current: Фудзин{Line}“ЦЕЛ?”
Monologue.Original: Fujin{Line}“SAFE?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Отличная работа.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Good job!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Где {Char Seifer}?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Where’s Seifer?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Завтра будут оглашены{Line} результаты экзамена.”{Next}“Всем быть в саду не{Line} позднее полудня.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Just be back at Garden by sundown.{Line} You’re free ’til then.”

Monologue.Current: “На сегодня все свободны.”
Monologue.Original: “Ok, dismissed!”

Monologue.Current: “Beautiful ocean, isn’t it...?{Line} Not like my hometown...{Line} This is the real thing...”
Monologue.Original: “Beautiful ocean, isn’t it...?{Line} Not like my hometown...{Line} This is the real thing...”

Monologue.Current: “My hometown is completely{Line} polluted with oil now...”
Monologue.Original: “My hometown is completely{Line} polluted with oil now...”

Monologue.Current: “I guess if you saw it everyday,{Line} you wouldn’t notice the transformation...”
Monologue.Original: “I guess if you saw it everyday,{Line} you wouldn’t notice the transformation...”

Monologue.Current: “I’ve come to realize this{Line} by looking at the blue,{Line} clear ocean here.”
Monologue.Original: “I’ve come to realize this{Line} by looking at the blue,{Line} clear ocean here.”

Monologue.Current: “It sure is beautiful...”
Monologue.Original: “It sure is beautiful...”

Monologue.Current: “There must be many things in this world{Line} that fade away unnoticed...”
Monologue.Original: “There must be many things in this world{Line} that fade away unnoticed...”

Monologue.Current: “I came to Balamb after hearing about{Line} an interesting fish caught in this region.”
Monologue.Original: “I came to Balamb after hearing about{Line} an interesting fish caught in this region.”

Monologue.Current: “Actually, I’m a chef, but I seem{Line} to have run out of ideas.”
Monologue.Original: “Actually, I’m a chef, but I seem{Line} to have run out of ideas.”

Monologue.Current: “There’s the delicacy, Balamb fish, but here,{Line} you can catch plenty of Badamb fish.{Line} You know, the ones that numb you.”
Monologue.Original: “There’s the delicacy, Balamb fish, but here,{Line} you can catch plenty of Badamb fish.{Line} You know, the ones that numb you.”

Monologue.Current: “I’ve been wracking my brain over{Line} how I should prepare them.”
Monologue.Original: “I’ve been wracking my brain over{Line} how I should prepare them.”

Monologue.Current: “Are you from around here?{Line} What kind of dishes do you like?”
Monologue.Original: “Are you from around here?{Line} What kind of dishes do you like?”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“Me, me, me!{Line} The dish I like is{Line} Ms. Moogle’s cake!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Me, me, me!{Line} The dish I like is{Line} Ms. Moogle’s cake!”

Monologue.Current: “Lots and lots of fruit on top,{Line} covered with fluffy cream,{Line} and it looks oh so yummy...”
Monologue.Original: “Lots and lots of fruit on top,{Line} covered with fluffy cream,{Line} and it looks oh so yummy...”

Monologue.Current: “I always eat one{Line} this big!”
Monologue.Original: “I always eat one{Line} this big!”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“...{Pause 80}Oh yeah...{Line} How ’bout you make a cake...”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“...{Pause 80}Oh yeah...{Line} How ’bout you make a cake...”

Monologue.Current: “And I get to try it!”
Monologue.Original: “And I get to try it!”

Monologue.Current: “...I’m not talking about desserts. I was{Line} talking about how to prepare the fish...”
Monologue.Original: “...I’m not talking about desserts. I was{Line} talking about how to prepare the fish...”

Monologue.Current: “It would be kinda nice to be able to{Line} bring a smile to cute girls like yourself.”
Monologue.Original: “It would be kinda nice to be able to{Line} bring a smile to cute girls like yourself.”

Monologue.Current: “That’s it!{Line} Maybe I’ll try making a cake{Line} with a Badamb fish...”
Monologue.Original: “That’s it!{Line} Maybe I’ll try making a cake{Line} with a Badamb fish...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Hm?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Hm?”

Monologue.Current: {Var 49} Gil came with the draw!
Monologue.Original: {Var 49} Gil came with the draw!

Monologue.Current: “Play some cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: “Play some cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “You seem to know rules{Line} unfamiliar to my hometown.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} my hometown’s rules and Balamb’s.”
Monologue.Original: “You seem to know rules{Line} unfamiliar to my hometown.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} my hometown’s rules and Balamb’s.”
